title: Ebikulu & Ebyogerwako - Orbital Temple
heading: Ebikulu & Ebyogerwako
description: Omulimu guno ogw’ebifaananyi ogumaze emyaka mingi, kitundu ku 13th Mercosul Bienal mu Porto Alegre, Brazil, nga gukuumibwa Marcelo Dantas. Ebadde ku lukalala oluwanvu olw’ekirabo kya Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Era ewangudde empaka za ArtSat Category mu mpaka za CubeDesign 2021, ezaatumbulwa ekitongole kya Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
